Detailed Description

This group holds all mesh kernels.

Since OpenMesh makes heavily use of templates especially in the kernels, there's no direct inheritence relationship of the kernel classes. For a conceptual overview of the inheritance graph see Conceptual Class Hierarchy. For a list of available methods see OpenMesh::Concepts::KernelT.

See also:
Conceptual Class Hierarchy, OpenMesh::Concepts::KernelT
